aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-4995-730 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Navigation system GPS signal loss. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 19/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 21/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 22/01/2025 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 25/01/2025 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
